title: Apt #1112 2-bed 1-bath with Double Sinks and Walk-in Closet
posting_body: ['Welcome to One South Market', 'We are now conducting both self-guided and guided tours!', 'Offering luxury high-rise living in a bustling city center, One South Market apartments takes you to new HEIGHTS in the heart of Downtown San Jose, California.', 'When it’s time to hit the town, an array of restaurants and cafés are at your doorstep.', 'Venture a little farther and shop at Santana Row or cheer on the San Jose Sharks at the SAP Center.', 'One South Market is central and convenient with the VTA Light Rail and Caltrain just minutes away.', 'Close to major commute routes on highways 87, 101, and I-280–putting all of Silicon Valley within your reach.', '***Prices are subject to change on a daily basis***', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 140', 'OR Text', '140', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1034 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Hardwood-Style Vinyl Flooring', '- Kitchen Island', '- High Ceilings', '- Large Closets', '- Floor to Ceiling Windows', '- In-Unit Washer/Dryer', '- Great View', '- Central Air Conditioning and Heat', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Bike Storage', '- Fitness Center', '- Resident Lounge', '- Pet Friendly*', '- Online Rental Payments', '- Swimming Pool', '- Club Room', '- Controlled Access', '- Wi-Fi in Common Areas', '- Elevator', '- LEED Certified', '- EV Charging Stations', '- Outdoor Firepit', '- BBQ Grill', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Maximum of 2 allowed per home.', 'Cats - allowed, Rent $50.00, Deposit $500.00', 'Dogs - allowed, Rent $75.00, Deposit $500.00', '*Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please see a Leasing Consultant for details.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5x the base rent.', 'Driving Directions', 'Cross street: Santa Clara Street', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'One South Market', '1 S Market St., San Jose, CA, 95113', 'DTysAL6fpDQG']
